snippet: Nakoula Basseley Nakoula denied using aliases or lying to the police about his role in the video “Innocence of Muslims.”
abstract: Nakoula Basseley Nakoula, man behind anti-Islam YouTube video that ignited bloody protests throughout the Muslim world, appears in federal court to deny violating terms of 2010 probation sentence after a bank fraud conviction.
lead_paragraph: Nakoula Basseley Nakoula denied using aliases or lying to the police about his role in the video “Innocence of Muslims.”

headline.seo: Man Tied to Anti-Islam Film Denies Probation Violations
headline.main: Man Tied to Anti-Islam Film Denies Probation Charges
